definitions.definition: A short poetical composition proper to be set to music or sung; a lyric poem; especially, now, a poem characterized by sustained noble sentiment and appropriate dignity of style.

main_definition: A short poetical composition proper to be set to music or sung; a lyric poem; especially, now, a poem characterized by sustained noble sentiment and appropriate dignity of style.

definitions.definition: An odonate ; a dragonfly or damselfly .

main_definition: ( slang ) An odonate ; a dragonfly or damselfly .
